name: Super Smash Balls PRO
description:
THE MOST FUNNY APP ANTI-STRESS, SMASH PLUMPERS BALLS!
Download Super Smash Balls PRO and play with the Plumpers!!!

PRO Special Contents:

- Extra Themed Worlds (during special holidays)
- No Adds
- 40 Bonus Diamonds

Venture in different worlds when the Plumpers (cutie although pretty crybabie creatures) , always fashion dressed, will appear on your smartphone ready to be smashed.

Smash as much as you can until the time is over and reach the goal for the next level.
Many levels with different settings where you must smash the Plumpers, compose puzzles, collect bonus but also avoid the Evil Plumpers!!

A super entertaining game, for men and women, young and old!!

Download it, you won't change your mind!!!

- Many levels in many different worlds
- Play without any wifi connection
- No Facebook or email login required
- Three different languages available (english, spanish, italian).
